aboutMe.name: Miraal Umar
aboutMe.description: My name is Miraal Umar, I'm a software engineering student at MCS, NUST. I started my coding journey two years ago and since then I've made several projects from desktop to web apps. I aspire to be a skilled developer and get my dream job one day. Besides coding, I enjoy Music, Anime, Books, and Swimming.
